full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Tender Reference [#](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/27/59a85bfd15a262aab3614d71450418c9/pr_30003399_-_itt_-_ll123_lancaster_range_demo_english.pdf)
#### Notice: Request for Proposal - LANCASTER RANGE DEMO D50

| Tender Reference | 30003399 |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | 30003399 |
| Publication Date | February 27, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | March 20, 2023 2:00 PM EST |

**Notice Type: Request for Proposal**

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the demolition of a wooden lighthouse structure and stone foundation on an island in the St. Lawrence River, located near South Lancaster, Ontario. The proposed contract duration will be approximately 3 months, starting on April 7, 2023, and ending on July 30, 2023.

**Location:**

The project is located on an island in the St. Lawrence River, approximately 20 km north of South Lancaster, Ontario.

**Description:**

The proposed works include:

- Demolition of the wooden lighthouse structure
- Demolition of the stone foundation
- All necessary excavation, clearing, and removal of debris

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to contractors from countries participating in the following free trade agreements:

- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Required Documents:**

Please note that the following documents are available for download from the [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/27/59a85bfd15a262aab3614d71450418c9/pr_30003399_-_
